solution_line_template: Tory sold {grandmother_packs} packs + {uncle_packs} packs = <<{grandmother_packs}+{uncle_packs}={sold_to_family}>>{sold_to_family} packs to his family members.
Tory sold {sold_to_family} packs + {neighbor_packs} packs = <<{sold_to_family}+{neighbor_packs}={total_sold}>>{total_sold} packs in total
He has to sell {target_packs} packs - {total_sold} packs = <<{target_packs}-{total_sold}={packs_needed}>>{packs_needed} more packs of cookies to reach his target
